description: iPod friendly SONY MDR-EX71SLWK Headphones fit snugly, yet comfortably, inside the ear. This eliminates the need for a headband, so you can enjoy audio while exercising, skating or dancing!  Gold plated, L-shaped stereo mini plug    Includes streamlined, compact hard carrying case and second set of earpads    White with silver and gray accents to coordinate with the iPod
title: Sony MDR-EX71SL/WK Fontopia Headphones (White) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
